attributes.action: Stop being so damn lenient on minorities in general
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is it just me, or is our country (uk) becoming completely ridiculous, when a member of a minority does something wrong, for example muslims standing outside churches telling christians "they will all burn in hell", they go completely scott free?? whereas if it was the other way around, apart from being stabbed to death by a muslim, the protester would go to prison.

what happens when they become the majority?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
